dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: The CARLA simulation environment was used both for training and testing. It simulates urban realistic environments (in terms of rendering and physics) and allows for direct communication with the simulated vehicle through a ROS bridge.
dcterms:title: CARLA

dcterms:creator: M. Quigley
K. Conley
B. Gerkey
J. Faust
T. Foote
J. Leibs
E. Berger
R. Wheeler
A. Y. Ng
dcterms:description: The use of a ROS bridge between the CARLA and the tracker results in a realistic system and simplifies the replacement of the CARLA by a real vehicle.
dcterms:title: ROS
